Welcome to the Python documentation!
=======================================

Python formatter: `Black <https://black.readthedocs.io/en/stable/>`_

Free Resources
^^^^^^^^^^^^^
| `realpython.com <realpython.com>`_: A plethora of Python tutorials covering pretty much any topic you can think of  
| `Pycoder's Weekly <https://pycoders.com/>`_: A free, weekly e-mail newsletter for those interested in Python development
